name: Save the Snowman (dzamloot)
description:
Press space or click to lower the temperature and summon snow. The more snow that reaches the ground, the more pounds that your bucket accumulates. 

If the temperature goes above the freezing point (32 degrees F), your snowman starts melting. The Sun also comes out every couple seconds and increases the temperature.

Try to go as long as you can without the snowman melting!

Value: increases the weight of each snowflake.

Blizzard: causes 10,000 snowflakes to summon and sets the temperature to 30 degrees.

Sunscreen: provides sun protection for one round.

Upgrade: increases the amount of snow that falls.
